annonstext:
For our client in Gothenburg we are looking for a .Net Engineer.

Description and What you’ll do

In this role you will get to join a co-located and cross-functional product team, and work with continuously delivering new features and running a stable, high-quality application. You will join forces on exciting challenges ahead, such as:

	Re-architecting parts of the application
	Transforming application from supporting inhouse business to also support company client facing applications.
	Building highly scalable and well-functioning api’s based on a micro service architecture
	Maintaining application/api’s based on Docker/Kubernetes in Azure

You and your skills

You are an Experienced Full stack .Net Engineer, who has work experience of 8+ years. 

It is important that you are passionate about what you do and have a high interest in keeping up with current best practices & know and care about sound engineering practices like continuous delivery, Test Driven Development, and automated testing. 

You are passionate about crafting clean code & are experienced working with modern infrastructure and tools. You are comfortable mentoring your peers and passionate about problem solving issues & are experienced working with agile software development methods like scrum and SAFe.

You range from being comfortable to experience with Technologies & Tools: 

C#, Javascript , Angular, Git, Azure DevOps , CI/CD pipeline Understanding of design patterns, unit testing, TDD, Sound knowledge of Micro Services, SQL server, Docker, Kubernetes.

As a bonus, you could have experience from iSeries or IBM I.

This is a full-time consultancy position in Gothenburg.

Start ASAP.

utbildningsniva.namn: Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre
